attributes.action: Bring the prevention and control of hospital aquired infections under Health and Safety law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that you are not able to ,for example, leave a trolley in an exposed position on health and safety grounds but there is no serious attempt to control and reduce the spread of MRSA or C difficile. For example,hospital staff are allowed to travel to and from work in uniforms, Doctors are often in civilian dress, visitors to the hospital are allowed to ignore hand wash dispensers. Hand washing is not enforced. Visitors are allowed too much access to hospitals. Cleaning services are contracted out to profit motivated private companies and not properly controlled by NHS managers and nursing staff do not have the authority to control the cleaners.
